body:
sorry i was drunk

I was writing big angry post abt Sansa and that phrase that made everyone pressed and mad. She’s not thankful to her abusers. She’s glad she outlived motherfuckers and knows how man can be.

Also, Daenarys is epitome of bad writing. I’m in such pain bcs of her character being brought to absolute bullshit trying to 1) make her inlove w/ Jon having 0 chemistry whatsoever and 2) trying to portray her as a “mad queen” tho she has every right to be angry and upset

Arya my girl being true to herself. I loved she refused Gendry dude was too fast

Cersei saves the day. She’s a brilliant villain. She’s complex and sometimes compelling, she’s challenging and that doesn’t necessarily means I root for her. I mean what else left in this mess.

Brienne is the sweetest and I will beat the shit out of Jaime no matter his reasoning I’m gonna fucking slap him unconscious and bring him back to Winterfell or Tarth. Goddamn!!!!!!!!

Also Missandei RIP Dracarys my girl 😔

I have a feeling that Dany, Arya and Cersei gonna die and Sansa gets the throne. Jon is fucking annoying I hope he’s lost.

All in all. I hated it. Bye.

blog.name: palabrasentretejidas
blog.title: PALABRAS ENTRETEJIDAS
blog.description:
Las palabras nos representan, nos transforman, nos entrelazan, nos 
contradicen; las palabras nos crean o nos destruyen; son, como todo lo maravilloso aquello que nos mueve y nos libera. Un libro, una frase, una palabra o una letra nos  significan y nos construyen; entretejemos palabras para expresar opiniones, sentimientos, emociones; entretejemos 
palabras en escritos, relatos, discursos, canciones, posturas; 
entretejemos y creamos y con esto SOMOS

summary: I forget where I saw these two lines
body:
I forget where I saw these two lines

Lord Gendry is in Stormsend doing whatever when he hears behind him.

You once asked me to come to Stormsend with you, it took a while but..

He turns around and it’s Arya, he doesn’t smile but walks torwards her stopping right in front of her. She continues

I can’t be the lady of Stormsend, it isn’t me, but if you’ll still have me I can be your wife.

He doesn’t say anything just bends down and kisses her, and welcomes her home

They spend the rest of their days exploring Westeros, eventually leaving the castle under the care of Ser Davos and sailing west.

Wish th I could give them credit but I can’t remember where they came from. And yes I know that I am a hopeless romantic with no luck of staying sane for these next two episodes

tags: Bringing this back because I need hope
title: My featherbed
body:
”My featherbed is deep and soft, and there I’ll lay you down,

I’ll dress you all in yellow silk, and on your head a crown.

For you shall be my lady love, and I shall be your lord.

I’ll always keep you warm and safe, and guard you with my sword.

And how she smiled and how she laughed, the maiden of the tree.

She spun away and said to him, no featherbed for me.

I’ll wear a gown of golden leaves, and bind my hair with grass,

But you can be my forest love, and me your forest lass” — GRRM, A Storm of Swords

tags: this is how it should've gone except better
summary: gendrya prompt : what if she accept his proposal, what would it be then?💖
question: gendrya prompt : what if she accept his proposal, what would it be then?💖
answer:
pity struck her heart like a bolt of lightning as she saw the fire in his eyes. they were ablaze with something - she didn’t know what - but in his drunken stupor, she knew what he was saying couldn’t possibly be true.

could it?

no, it was not feasible. he could not love her. she yearned for his touch, his mouth on her own. ultimately, she gave in and stooped to his height, pressing his lips to hers. her heart raced for a moment, but she forced it to slow as they stood. 

a girl cannot be loved.

the wolf inside howled in pain.

“i’m not a lady. i never have been. that’s not me.” her words came out as a whisper. his smile faded, and the joy began to vanish entirely. much to her surprise, he didn’t protest. didn’t argue. didn’t beg. he just…accepted it. he simply nodded and began to walk away, perhaps to drink some more, and her heart cried no! no! you’re making a mistake! 

she could see sansa sighing in exasperation, the hound cursing her, jon smiling sadly. even now, she knew bran would shake his head. if she ever told them what had transpired, that was undoubtedly what they would do.

“wait.” the word left her mouth before she even realized what she was doing. gendry stopped so suddenly, arya thought he must’ve ran into a wall. her heart pounded like the drums of war; she worried all of winterfell could hear it as she took a deep breath. 

“i couldn’t be a lady, not even yours. and i have something to do, but after…” she paused, her hands quivering.  “i don’t think my life would be worth anything if you weren’t by my side, either.”

gendry took a step back in her direction, cautious. so arya continued. “if you’re okay with me not being proper and all, if you can wait until after this shitshow is over, then yes. i’ll marry you. and we’ll figure out the rest-” she was cut off suddenly as gendry crossed over to her and swept her into a kiss.

this was deeper, more passionate than the last. just like their first one, she noted. her hands snaked their way around the back of his neck and held him with no intention of ever letting go.
